thread.title: BRIEF-China Water Industry Group Says Unit ‍Entered Into Construction Agreement For RMB120 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Water Industry Group Says Unit ‍Entered Into Construction Agreement For RMB120 Million

organizations.name: reuters) - china water industry group ltd
brief-china water industry group says unit ‍entered into construction

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - China Water Industry Group Ltd:
* CO ‍ENTERED INTO CONSTRUCTION AGREEMENT WITH CHINA MINSHENG DRAWIN CONSTRUCTION​ FOR RMB120 MILLION
* CO ENTERED CONSTRUCTION AGREEMENT THROUGH ITS UNIT HUIZHOU COMPANY
* TRANSACTIONS UNDER AGREEMENTS NOT EXPECTED TO HAVE IMMEDIATE IMPACT ON EARNINGS OF GROUP FOR YEAR ENDING 31 DECEMBER 2018
